data.eml:eml: Eight new species of Oragua Melichar, 1926 (Insecta: Hemiptera: Cicadellidae) from Amazonas State, Brazil, with description of the female terminalia of Oragua jurua Young, 1977, and new records for the genus

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Camisão, Beatriz M., Cavichioli, Rodney R., Takiya, Daniela M. (2014): Eight new species of Oragua Melichar, 1926 (Insecta: Hemiptera: Cicadellidae) from Amazonas State, Brazil, with description of the female terminalia of Oragua jurua Young, 1977, and new records for the genus. Zootaxa 3841 (4): 501-527, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3841.4.3
